Select VI By Name Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Edit»Find and Replace to display the Find dialog box and click the Objects button. Click the Select Object button and select VIs by Name from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to set options for searching for a VI in memory by name.

This dialog includes the following components:

  • VIs in Memory—Lists in alphabetical order the VIs in the selected application instance.
  • Selected Object—Displays the icon of the object you select in the VIs in Memory listbox.
  • Show—Determines which objects display in the VIs in Memory listbox.
    • VIs—Displays VIs in the VIs in Memory listbox.
    • Globals—Displays globals in the VIs in Memory listbox.
    • Type Defs—Displays type definitions in the VIs in Memory listbox.
